definition: horizontal bar to hold a door closed (made of wood or metal)/door bolt

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: For example: R1 service door upper guide and door latch on doorframe is worn.
sentences.chinese: R1服务门上导轨和门框的门闩陈旧并且磨损。

sentences.english: If a gate was hard to open, he oiled the latch.
sentences.chinese: 如果他遇到一扇难开的门，他就涂一些油在门闩上。

sentences.english: Oft shall the pilgrim lift the latch.
sentences.chinese: 香客将常启开我门的门闩。

sentences.english: Use gentle pressure with elbows to release latch.
sentences.chinese: 用手肘部轻压就可打开门闩。

sentences.english: Stop your horse at the gate and unlatch it.
sentences.chinese: 在门的前面停下你的马，然后拔掉门闩。

sentences.english: He laid his hand softly upon the latch , and put his knee against the door .
sentences.chinese: 他把手轻轻地放在门闩上，用漆头抵住门。

sentences.english: The courtiers , having entered, brought furnaces and massy hammers and welded the bolts.
sentences.chinese: 这帮朝臣进得门来，便拿熔炉和巨型铁锤焊死了门闩。

sentences.english: We have a bolt as well as a lock on the door.
sentences.chinese: 我们的门上有一个门闩和一把锁。

sentences.english: Use gentle pressure with elbows to latch.
sentences.chinese: 用手肘部轻压就可打开门闩。

sentences.english: Presently there was a sound of footsteps and a shooting of bolts, and the door opened a little.
sentences.chinese: 不一会儿，传来脚步和拉门闩的声音，门开了一道缝。

sentences.english: The PAM consists of the Structure Latch Mechanisms (SLMs) and the Umbilical Connector Mechanisms (UCMs).
sentences.chinese: 其由结构门闩和系带连接机构组成。

sentences.english: The bolt and handle are deadlocked against turning.
sentences.chinese: 门闩和把手全卡住了，转动不了。

sentences.english: One battery latch can blow the whole river stone effect.
sentences.chinese: 一个电池门闩可以有吹走整条河的石头的效应。

sentences.english: The dog pressed his paw on the latch to let himself in.
sentences.chinese: 那狗用脚爪按住门闩把自己放进来。

sentences.english: To the short ends of the mobile plate are fixed the parallelepiped by bolts.
sentences.chinese: 对移动板块的短结束被门闩修理平行六面体。

sentences.english: The factory had been closed all day, the carriage gate was bolted, the street was deserted.
sentences.chinese: 工厂停了一天工，正门闩起来了，街上行人稀少。

definition: variant of 門閂|门闩[men2 shuan1]
to stand as a goalkeeper/to keep guard on a gate
bolt (for locking a window, cabinet etc)/(electrical) plug
door knocker (in the shape of a ring)
door/the opening panel of a door
